definitions.definition: a strip of gathered or pleated material sewn by one side onto a garment or larger piece of material as a decorative edging or ornament.
examples: ruffle, flounce, ruff, furbelow, jabot, peplum, ruche, ruching, fringe; purfle a full skirt with a wide frill

definitions.definition: a thing resembling a frill in appearance or function.
examples: a frill of silver hair surrounded a shining bald pate

definitions.definition: a natural fringe of feathers or hair on a bird or other animal.
an upward-curving bony plate extending behind the skull of many ceratopsian dinosaurs.
an unnecessary extra feature or embellishment.
examples: it was just a comfortable apartment with no frills
synonyms: superfluities "a comfortable apartment with no frills"
